column4: antares79:: audioscrobbler is just something that logs your preference of music
antares79:: if your plugin actually plays last.fm streams.. then you don't need anything else
antares79:: what player are you using?
Is this a good command: sudo hal-get-property --udi 13b1:000e --key linux.sysfs_path
yea... I need to be able to somehow learn where a device is located under /sys
I figured hal-get-property was a good idea....
